data.eml:eml: New records of water mites of the genus Atractides Koch, 1837 (Acari: Hydrachnidia, Hygrobatidae) from South Africa, with descriptions of five new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pešić, Vladimir, Smit, Harry, Gerecke, Reinhard (2011): New records of water mites of the genus Atractides Koch, 1837 (Acari: Hydrachnidia, Hygrobatidae) from South Africa, with descriptions of five new species. Zootaxa 2986: 1-54, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.200656
